name: Contra III The Alien Wars
description: In the year 2636, the Alien War rages on, and it's up to two soldiers, Jimbo and Scully, to stop the invasion. In this US version of the Super NESâ„¢ classic, play solo or with a friend and battle through six stages of non-stop, run-and-gun action. Collect power-ups including bombs, flamethrowers, spread shots, lasers and homing guns. Control Jimbo and Scully as they travel through war-torn cities, race on air bikes, ride missiles and ultimately break into the alien base to defeat the boss once and for all. Please note, this title was originally released in Europe as "Super Probotector: Alien Rebels". This is the US version of the game.
